data.title: Movimento Life Beyond Tourism Travel to Dialogue
data.text:
An architect designer that is ambitious to art and design. I believe to be appreciative of and sensitive to art and beauty. Nature and its colors in specific are what I admire the most; which therefore, I tend to aim in painting portraits and plants due to the sensitivity of Read more [...]

Painter and restorer

19 years Old, landscape architecture student at university of Bahrain

Arnaldo Marini, Florence 1952, graduated in Architecture from the University of Florence. He has worked as a freelancer and in Public Administrations. For some years he has interrupted a long creative silence by returning to the art scene, interpreter of numerous personal and collective exhibitions in Italy and abroad. […] Read more [...]

LUKA KIKNADZE, BA. Painter, Illustrator, born in 1995, Tbilisi, Georgia. Key Skills: Painting, Drawing, Illustration. Luka Kiknadze holds degree of Bachelor of Arts, graduated from Faculty of Design, Graphics, Illustration, of the Tbilisi State Academy of Arts, Tbilisi, Georgia in 2020. During 2015-2016 Luka also studied architecture at the Faculty Read more [...]

architect-artist, designer. Senior Lecturer at Azerbaijan University of Architecture and Civil Engineering

Italian Artist

Sergio Illuminato is a professional italian artist and author / organizer of cultural, theatrical, television and film events working on the international stages. Born in Catania (Sicily), currently lives and works in Rome. Degree in Literature and Philosophy, Theater and Show address, University of Rome “La Sapienza”. Painting Course Academy Read more [...]

I am an architect and as such I did architecture drawings, mainly in pencil, but also in ink and acquarel.

Ars longa, vita brevis. I am a self-taught artist. I cut small spaces between daily tasks to devote myself to expressive research. The beauty of color and form is not a sufficient end in art: we are used to looking for a meaning, an external relationship between the parts of Read more [...]

Profilo Artista Daniela Oddo Daniela Oddo born in Florence in 1976 has always been interested in art in all its expressive forms. She has actively participated in seminars and artistic events but only after numerous travels and personal experiences that have marked her emotionally has she finally decided to print Read more [...]

My research on color, already in the analog era, is based on the abstraction of the image from a visually concrete reality. The ACQUASTRATTA project was conceived in 2003, the international year of water, and is a registered trademark. Recovering from nature that existing according to the impressionism of Claude Read more [...]

Maurizio Mastromatteo’s Profile Maurizio Mastromatteo, born in 1974, is a sculptor from Florence, Italy. He went through experimentation with painting, papier-mache and mosaic, then he finally came to ceramic.With the use of the luster and the oxygen reduction’s firing technique, he gets bright and iridescent colors. He often uses the Read more [...]

Benin land of art and culture. Country with a rich cultural and religious heritage. Lionel YAMADJAKO stands out as a refined and professional connoisseur in the original artistic creation. He was born on January 12, 1984 in Cotonou. His talent and passion for art was signed from an early age Read more [...]

Lyric-spatial painter and poet Degree in letters from the University of Pisa. Trossi-Uberti Academy Livorno Courses Sculpture. Florence: Bottega Gassman and DRAMATURGY School of EDOARDO De FILIPPO. ROME: CINEMATOGRAPHIC writing with Leo Benvenuti. Quotes on CAM Mondadori. She lived in Florence for a long time and then moved to Rome Read more [...]

Grazia Tomberli was born in Florence, where she lives. Daughter of art, she began painting since school age. After graduating from the Artistic Lyceum of Florence, in 1975 she graduated in Architecture and in 1984 she graduated from the Academy of Fine Arts in the Painting Section. As a painter Read more [...]

SEARCH FOR HUMAN VALUES My images reflect life learning and experiences in my search for human values. Life in its ideas, diversity and social opportunities, and closeness to nature, has offered me richness as an artist. Meaning for me is this search for human values in the rich ethos of Read more [...]

https://www.andreabenetti.eu (ENG) – https://www.andreabenetti.com (ITA) BIOGRAPHY OF ANDREA BENETTI Born in 1964, Andrea Benetti created and drew up the “Manifesto of Neo Cave Art” presented at the 53rd Venice Biennale, in the pavilion called “Nature and Dreams”, located at the Ca ‘Foscari University. Conceptually, the Manifesto is inspired by the Read more [...]

Alessandro Bargellini was born in Florence in 1961, where he lives and works. He began to paint while still a teenager and later deepened his knowledge of drawing, painting and screen printing techniques by attending the “Leonardo” School of Art in Prato with the Masters Resmi Al Kafaji, Guglielmo Malato Read more [...]

Nikola Ojdanic is an artist from Serbia, graduated from the Faculty of Applied Arts in Belgrade. He is a painter, illustrator, cartoonist and designer, who has exhibited in several group exhibitions at home and abroad. His main area of work and interest is painting. His motifs and vision transform and Read more [...]

Florentine artist, pupil of Tuscan painters. It reproduces on canvas the Tuscan landscapes she loved so much. The techniques used are oil on canvas, oil on plaster, fake fresco and mixed media. Her paintings are full of color with which she wants to represent her impulses to herself and to Read more [...]

Silvia Serafini – Artist Silvia Serafini was born in 1966 and has always lived in Florence. His life is entirely dedicated to art, from youth studies to the Institute for the Arts and Restoration of Palazzo Spinelli and later the Free School of the Nude at the Academy of Fine Read more [...]

Rolando Scatarzi was born in 1941 in Florence where he currently lives. He started painting at a very young age influenced by the Tuscan Macchiaioli and the Impressionists. Always attracted, however, by non-figurative painting, in the early seventies he devoted himself to the study of the same to find its Read more [...]

The painter of lights and places Biographical sketch: Born in Pisa on October 26th, 1962 Master of art since 1981, he takes part in group exhibitions in Tuscany with important consents from the audience and reviews. Fan of Tuscan’s landscapes he loves the introspective and delicate painting in eternal armony Read more [...]

Valerio Mirannalti was born in Florence, Italy on 1 January 1971. He lives and works in Fiesole, a town in the hills above Florence. “I live in Fiesole where I have my atelier. I am a “en plein air” painter and I love turn around my country. I give lectures Read more [...]

Born in Rome where she completed her studies, moved to Florence here she began her artistic activity with numerous group shows and her first solo exhibition at the Galleria S: Jacopo (Ponte Vecchio) in 1970, with inclusion in the volume Contemporary Italian Artists. Numerous group participations in important venues (last Read more [...]

BIOGRAPHY PAOLO VANNINI was born in Signa (Florence) on 11/20/1951 where he lives and works and has his studio in Via Roma 234 / a. The shapes, the color, the nature, all elements that from a very young age have fascinated the painter, the man, officially entering the pictorial world Read more [...]

BIOGRAPHY Born in Piedmont in 1956, Franco Curvo lived for many years in La Spezia and has lived in Florence since 1991. He graduated in mathematics (Pisa 1980) and spent 37 years doing his own professional activity in an IT sector. His logical / technical approach did not prevent him Read more [...]

Paola Imposimato, professional Painter in Florence, with degree from “Academy of Fine Arts”, has organized several “Personal Exhibitions”,“Group Exhibitions”and “Permanent Exhibitions”, has realized ninety five Banners, or better Palii (plural of“Palio“) of famous Historical Reenactments in Italy and beyond. She developed Cooperation Activities with well known Fashion Enterprises for several Read more [...]

Born in Sardinia and raised in Tuscany, my father’s land, I attended the Liceo Artistico Firenze2 and later the Faculty of Architecture in Florence. I have been involved in the arts of drawing at 360° and since the end of the 80s I have dedicated myself mainly to painting with Read more [...]
